about_the_game:
FEATURES

  • A fast-paced rogue-lite looter shooter based in the nineties.
  • A unique stylized presentation with spectacular hand painted environments and characters.
  • 1-6 player couch coop compatible with Keyboard/Mouse and/or most modern controllers.
  • Dynamic difficulty adjusts automatically to provider players with a fun and challenging experience.
  • Players can swap between a wide variety of weapons and upgrade them on the move.

SYNOPSIS

It was a cool Halloween evening, late October 1993, and as the people of Havenview were out trick or treating, you had been putting the final touches onto your Johnny Lazer space costume. Unlike previous years, though, it was getting quiet outside and there were sounds of sporadic gunfire in the distance. With your family still out trick or treating, it was time to step out into the night and find out what was going on.

GAMEPLAY

Havenview is a local cooperative multiplayer Halloween looter shooter jam packed with 90s nostalgia. Play solo or with up to 5 friends. Investigate the disappearance of your neighbours, scavenge for upgrades, weapons and useful items that will assist you in your battle against a mysterious enemy across a beautifully stylized city. It's a race against time to take back your city and become the Halloween hero of Havenview.

short_description: Havenview is a 1-6 player, couch coop, rogue-lite looter shooter based in the nineties. Battle your way through suburbia to the depths of the alien mothership as you search for upgrades and useful items to help you banish the invaders of Havenview.
